title: Client crashing
body: 2 games ago as I joined a norms the client crashed randomly and showed a message saying it needed to shut down. I restarted the client and waited 7 minutes for a new update when I had already loaded this mornings update. That game got remade. Start a new game and as soon as loading screen opens up same thing. I restart client and get the same message and then in the top left corner of the loading screen on the 3rd attempt to restart it showed a message saying, "record error 2003 please contact customer support".

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me. Let me know if this helps.
